data.quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
data.author: Albus Dumbledore

data.quote: It does not do well to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
data.author: Albus Dumbledore

data.quote: To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.
data.author: Albus Dumbledore

data.quote: Fear of a name only increases fear of the thing itself.
data.author: Albus Dumbledore

data.quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
data.author: Albus Dumbledore

data.quote: happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
data.author: Albus Dumbledore

data.quote: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
data.author: Albus Dumbledore

data.quote: Things we lose have a way of coming back to us in the end, if not always in the way we expect.
data.author: Luna Lovegood

data.quote: We’ve all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on. That’s who we really are.
data.author: Sirius Black

data.quote: Every human life is worth the same, and worth saving.
data.author: Kingsley Shacklebolt

data.quote: You sort of start thinking anything’s possible if you’ve got enough nerve.
data.author: J.K Rowling

data.quote: Until the very end.
data.author: J.K Rowling

data.quote: We must all face the choice between what is right and what is easy.
data.author: Albus Dumbledore

data.quote: We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided.
data.author: Albus Dumbledore

data.quote: Differences of habit and language are nothing at all if our aims are identical and our hearts are open.
data.author: Albus Dumbledore

data.quote: Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it.
data.author: Albus Dumbledore

data.quote: Perhaps those who are best suited to power are those who have never sought it.
data.author: Albus Dumbledore

data.quote: Words are, in my not so humble opinion, our most inexhaustible source of magic, capable of both influencing injury, and remedying it.
data.author: Albus Dumbledore

data.quote: Understanding is the first step to acceptance, and only with acceptance can there be recovery.
data.author: Albus Dumbledore

data.quote: If you want to know what a man’s like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
data.author: Sirius Black

data.quote: People find it far easier to forgive others for being wrong than being right.
data.author: Albus Dumbledore
